module.name: implements_parent
module.comment: 自动生成的 ts class Bean 定义

bean.name: FireEffect
bean.comment: Fire effect implements single interface Generated: <bean name="FireEffect" parent="IEntity">

bean.name: HealEffect
bean.comment: Heal effect implements intermediate interface Generated: <bean name="HealEffect" parent="IEffect">

bean.name: PoisonEffect
bean.comment: Poison effect implements single interface with validators Generated: <bean name="PoisonEffect" parent="IEffect">

bean.name: BuffEffect
bean.comment: Buff effect extends a class (extends takes priority) Generated: <bean name="BuffEffect" parent="PoisonEffect">

bean.name: MultiInterfaceEffect
bean.comment: Effect with multiple implements (ambiguous, no parent) Generated: <bean name="MultiInterfaceEffect">

bean.name: StandaloneClass
bean.comment: Standalone class without implements or extends (no parent) Generated: <bean name="StandaloneClass">
